SIDEBAR_APPS.TITLE: Custom Apps
SIDEBAR_APPS.DESCRIPTION: Custom Apps allow you to embed external applications directly in the Chatwoot sidebar. These apps can provide additional functionality and integrations for your team.

FORM.ICON_HELP: Select an icon to represent your app in the sidebar
FORM.LOCATION_HELP: Choose where the app appears: directly in the main sidebar or inside the Apps submenu
FORM.POSITION_ERROR: Position must be a number greater than or equal to 0
FORM.ROLES_HELP: Leave empty to allow all roles, or select specific roles that can see this app

CREATE.API_ERROR: Failed to create app. Please try again

UPDATE.API_ERROR: Failed to update app. Please try again

DELETE.TITLE: Delete Custom App
DELETE.MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete {appName}? This action cannot be undone.
DELETE.API_ERROR: Failed to delete app. Please try again
